name: Standard Answer
description: Meets rubric fully with accurate, clear but surface-level reasoning
guidance:
Comprehension & Recall: The answer accurately Restates facts, definitions, or examples directly from materials or online knowledge community/social media platform references.
Focus on the "What": Correctly describes the concept, but does not go deeper.

name: Latent Answer
description: Meets rubric fully with deeper reasoning and critical engagement
guidance:
Analysis, Synthesis, or Evaluation: The answer explains underlying mechanisms, connects ideas, considers implications, or makes critical judgments.
Focus on the "Why/How": It explains beyond description, may use evidence to support reasoning.
